metadata.title: CVE-2020-28645 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Deleting users with certain names caused system files to be deleted. Riskis higher for systems which allow users to register themselves and have thedata directory in the web root. This affects ownCloud/core versions < 10.6.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
